content.body: Arthur Hemery: missed your question yesterday somehow. The idea is that HTML pokes through to the internal response for that, but it probably does not do so today.

content.body: Arthur Hemery: Fetch doesn't remove the headers, but it does obscure them. (Given Spectre ideally we would remove most headers before handing the response to an attacker process, but that's a thing we haven't tried tackling so far.)
